  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE SPILL USING DECSION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. USING THE CORROSIVE RESPOSNE SHEET, RESPONDER CONTAINED THE SPILL AND PROCESSED IT WITH THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART IN THE DMP AREA.
